Appearance

HJXA Compiled UI Language

Unify structure, style, and logic into a single .hjx file

Get Started
View Examples

Single File Components

Write HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in one .hjx file. No more jumping between multiple files.

Zero Dependencies

Compiles to clean, dependency-free HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Runs anywhere.

Reactive State

Built-in state management with automatic UI updates when state changes.

Server-Driven Mode

Optional server-driven state management via WebSocket for complex applications.

Hot Reload

Fast development cycle with instant updates as you type.

TypeScript Support

Full TypeScript support with type-safe runtime APIs.

Quick Example ​

hjx
component Counter

state:
  count = 0

layout:
  view.card:
    text: "Count: {{count}}"
    button (on click -> inc): "Increase"

style:
  .card { padding: 20px; }
  button { cursor: pointer; }

handlers:
  inc:
    set count = count + 1
